We take a
reflexive approach to the relationship between theory and practice. From here,
it is particularly important to understand theory as a relevant reference
dimension of pedagogical action. Theory should help us to better understand and
actively shape our pedagogical practice. At the same time, theory cannot be
learnt statically. Rather, it is also a matter of reflexively working on
theory, modifying it if necessary or incorporating further theoretical
perspectives.
Hooks, bell (1991): Theory as Liberatory Practice
Aktivität Hooks, bell (1991): Theory as Liberatory Practice auswählen
